header.postText: The former Chief Rabbi, Lord Jonathan Sacks, is the winner of this year's Templeton Prize. For decades he has been lecturing and writing on themes of faith, tolerance and peace. Evan Davis began by asking him a simple question - does religion cause war? . . Newsnight is the BBC's flagship news and current affairs TV programme - with analysis, debate, exclusives, and robust interviews. . . YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/BBCNewsn... . Twitter: https://twitter.com/BBCNewsnight. Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnewsnight. Snapchat: https://www.snapchat.com/add/bbcnewsn...
